topics.body:
Well shit; the situation in Iraq is getting worse by the second.

Would it be accurate to call ISIS the religious equivalent of the borg?
"Resistance is futile; you will be assimilated into Islam.  Your religious and cultural differences will be purged"

The best option at this point is to focus on evacuating the region of civilians(like we have been) and preventing them gaining further ground.
